ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This works very well.  I hunt occasionally with an enchanter friend.  She would cast the inital debuff to lower magic resistance, the critter charges, the
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:36 AM 05/26/1999 +0200, you wrote:
>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>I agree thet our spells need a lower resistance against reds, but i dont
>know how we work in combination with enchanter wich lower resistance to
>higer reds and us nuking after this? maybe this was idea of vereant crew,
>anyone have experience with combat of wizard 16 or more lv with similar lv
>enchanter wich cast debuffs to lower resistance on high reds to confirm this?

This works very well. I hunt occasionally with an enchanter friend. She
would cast the inital debuff to lower magic resistance, the critter
charges, the pet blocks, I root and we both blast. If we get into trouble,
the pet blocks, I root and we both Gate. Great system.

-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
